titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4569) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1999, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-725, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4569 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. After general debate the bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule for not to exceed 5 hours. Measure will be read by paragraph. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 250.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 188 (Roll No. 446).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/16/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 4569 (foreign operations, export financing, and related programs appropriations).
